title: Supply systems
fullText:
The low voltage electrical supply for any connectable electrical installation shall be installed in accordance with:
(a) AS/NZS 3000; and
(b) the additional or modified requirements of AS/NZS 3001.1; and
(c) other applicable Standards including:
(i) AS/NZS 4509.
(ii) AS/NZS 3010.
(iii) AS/NZS 5033.
(iv) AS/NZS 4777.
(v) AS/NZS 4763.
(vi) AS/NZS 5139.
See Figures 2.2 and 2.3 for typical supply arrangements.
